name.description: Descriptive name for the banner (e.g., 'Homepage Hero Banner')

image_url.description: URL of the uploaded banner image

alt_text.description: Alternative text for the image (for accessibility)

position.description: Vertical positioning of the image within the banner

associated_pages.description: List of public page names where this banner should appear

display_order.description: Order priority if multiple banners on same page (lower numbers show first)

is_active.description: Whether this banner is currently active
